parameters.name: version_date
parameters.description: Release date of the API version in YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the new classifier. Cannot contain special characters.

parameters.name: classname_positive_examples
parameters.description: A compressed (.zip) file of images that depict the visual subject for a class within the new classifier. Must contain a minimum of 10 images. The swagger limits you to training only one class. To train more classes, use the API functionality.

parameters.name: negative_examples
parameters.description: A compressed (.zip) file of images that do not depict the visual subject of any of the classes of the new classifier. Must contain a minimum of 10 images.
